mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPLE_BOARD ( BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_PRICE, USER_ID, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE ) VALUES( #{board_seq}, #{board_title}, #{board_price}, #{user_id}, #{board_content}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM APPLE_BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq}
DELETE FROM APPLE_PICTURE WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(board_seq.NEXTVAL) AS BOARD_SEQ FROM dual
SELECT A.*, B.PICTURE_URL FROM APPLE_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN APPLE_PICTURE B ON A.BOARD_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ ORDER BY A.BOARD_SEQ DESC
SELECT A.*, B.PICTURE_URL FROM APPLE_BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN APPLE_PICTURE B ON A.BOARD_SEQ = B.BOARD_SEQ WHERE A.BOARD_SEQ = #{board_seq}
